long_description: Stay comfortable on warm paddling days with the Seals Tropical Tour 2.2 spray skirt. Sympatex(R) laminate fabric on deck and tunnel is durable, breathable and impervious to the elements. Double-stitched construction with sealed seams ensures long-lasting wear and water resistance. Strong bungee rim gripping system firmly secures skirt to cockpit coaming. Front webbing grab loop with comfort handle assists with entry and wet exits. Tensioned deck stay creates a convex bend in fabric so water runs off, rather than collecting and pooling on top the skirt. Removable elastic shoulder straps secure skirt and keep tunnel tensioned. Neoprene waist has adjustable rip-and-stick sides for a custom fit. Mesh deck pocket stores small essentials; 4 lash loops offer easy attachment of accessories. Ballistic nylon panels on the edge of the skirt protect it from abrasion.
short_description: Stay comfortable on warm paddling days with the Seals Tropical Tour 2.2 spray skirt.
